short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Catch links in fast moving twitch chat, moving them to a managable list for easy clicking!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension monitors Twitch chat, saving all links posted in chat to a separate list. Clicking the Twitch Links icon will show all captured links, allowing you to easily view and click them without fighting the tide of new chat posts coming in. Links will only be shown for the currently open twitch window/tab, but will be read in the background for all active tabs. Enjoy!
